name: My Fingers!
description:
Due to having extraordinary abilities, Tom is kicked out of his village and goes to the dungeon. Help him get out of it in this thrilling platformer. Complete many handcrafted and refined levels to discover the secret of the place where it is located.


  • Single-player game divided into levels
  • Large dungeon with many levels
  • Instant re-spawn
  • High difficulty level, requiring dexterity and thinking
  • Levels that reward out-of-the-box thinking
  • Timer for speedrunners
  • High character mobility
  • Unlimited possibilities of combining Tom's powers

The controls and powers you have during the game are not complicated, but combining them at the right time and in the right way will be quite a challenge. The secret of the dungeon is waiting for you, good luck.
